price: 66. Waxay (ehlu naarku) wax ka cuni (geedkaa) oo ka buuxin caloolahooda.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
